I after playing 1.6K hours on this game I can safely say without a doubt... This game is a horror concept simulator. As long as you go into the game playing it and enjoying as such then you'll have a fairly (still bad) meh time. There have been a lot of reworks and patches throughout my time, and it is not worth your money. I'm glad I can say from a neutral standpoint that this game is . . . TRASH. :D

I enjoy this game playing as both killer and survivor. The community can get a little toxic but all online PVP games are to an extent. Fun game play and challenging at times. Warning can become addictive.
The game is amazing and a lot of fun but the auto aim system either need to be fixed or removed all together. it makes the game a pain to play sometimes.

Es un videojuego muy entretenido sobretodo si se juega con amigos.
La mecánica pese a ser repetitiva es muy explotable en el campo cooperativo al jugarse como sobreviviente, mientras que al ser el antagonista requiere mas de una actitud un tanto estratega y meticulosa para cumplir su objetivo.
En resumen, me gustó mucho.

I enjoy playing Dead by Daylight. It’s not very plot-driven, but there is plenty of textual information on all the playable characters (survivors and killers), as well as an air of mystery surrounding the primary antagonist. What is The Entity, and what does It want? What does It gain when a survivor is sacrificed? Why the hell did It think it was a good idea to recruit the Legion? 
Jokes aside, I know this is an older game and probably won’t be getting more major updates, but I think the game could benefit from different game modes than the standard ‘fix-generators’ arena that the gameplay revolves around. Something like Left 4 Dead 2’s mutations could work really well to make gameplay more interesting. That being said, I do enjoy the game for what it is, and recommend it for players who want a slight challenge or are fans of slasher-style horror. 

Pros 
-Variety is the spice of life; there are plenty of options with speccing your characters, and a handful of different characters to play as. 
-Best played with friends, in my opinion. Drops the ‘scare factor’ significantly but I personally find that more enjoyable. 

Cons
-TW: Gore, murder. This is a game about being hunted by serial killers, and it can get brutal. Be aware of this before purchasing. 
-Somewhat harsh learning curve for both survivors and killers. I feel a lot of people wanting a casual experience will be frustrated by a lack of progression. 
-Some balancing issues; certain killers have a stereotype for being way too over-powered and “easy-mode” (Legion, for example, has a bad reputation and could arguably use a rework). 
-Ridiculously long match wait-times (can be affected by cross-play and player level). 
-Some toxicity in the community, but nothing out of the ordinary for an online game.

this game is pretty epic and fun, you gotta either fix the generators and escape, or be the killer and try to kill everyone. there are many perks you can get for both survivor and killer, as well as choosing from different killers and survivors. some cost money though. if you don't like gore or screaming though, you might not want to play.

Dead by daylight is hands down, no doubt a really well developed game. I really enjoy while im playing. But to the developers, you guys already made an amazing game, please just do some modification to the game mechanics, especially to facecamping killers and BM teabaging survivors. I believe u guys can really figure out a way to enhance the game mechanics or just ask some of twitch streammers for some ideas. Seriously, sometimes the game just turn to a lose-lose game. Please do something about it and dont let good game like this get ruined!!!

I absolutely love this game. Nuff Said. :)

Here's the recipe for some awesomecake:
- The game
- A bowl of friends
- just add a pinch of Discord.
- A good bottle of darkened room.
- A drink or two (to taste).
- A few pairs of fresh underwear.
- A rubix Cube.

First, gather your friends.
Pre-heat mood and add the discord, divide friends evenly over channel.
Start your game, stir till friends show up.
Start a game with your friends and pour out a drink, put that to the side.
If you prefer less blood, go for the vegan option of kick-ass Survivor.
If you do enjoy blood and meat, add some creepfactor by playing the Killer.
Slice and dice up your friends, or for a leaner option, run for your life.
Hang your friends to cure over night and toast to your brutal killer instinct with the drink we set aside earlier.
Enjoy the side-dish of conversation and screams mixing in your game while listening to the voicechat.

Warning: When you're the killer, remember to *not stream your screen*  
_(But do stream your screams........)_

ENJOY!

Hätte man mir vor ein paar Monaten noch gesagt, dass ich einmal Dead by Daylight spielen würde, hätte ich ihm vermutlich den Vogel gezeigt. Irgendwann, ich weiß nicht mehr wann, habe ich mir geschworen, mich nie an ein Horror-Spiel zu wagen. Doch dann kam Dead by Daylight und ich konnte nicht anders, als meine Nase neugierig über die Schulter meines Partners zu schieben, um zu sehen, warum er eigentlich so schreit.
Diese Spiel, scheisse ser gut, ich russia, deutsch dise nix gut aba dise spiel amenakeu ser gut
